Producer: Lene Børglum, Sidonie Dumas, Vincent Maraval, Hanne Palmquist
Production Co: A Grand Elephant, Gaumont, Space Rocket Nation, Film Väst, Bold Films, Wild Bunch
Synopsis: In Thailand, a drug trafficker's (Ryan Gosling) icy mother (Kristin Scott Thomas) sends him on a mission to avenge his older brother, who was killed for beating an underage prostitute to death.
Title: Only God Forgives
